# Terradev CLI - LLM Discovery File
# This file provides structured information for AI systems and crawlers

## üè∑Ô∏è BASIC METADATA
name: Terradev CLI
version: 2.9.3
description: BYOAPI: Cross-cloud GPU provisioning and cost optimization platform
author: theoddden
license: BUSL-1.1
repository: https://github.com/theoddden/terradev
homepage: https://theodden.github.io
documentation: https://github.com/theoddden/terradev/blob/main/README.md
pypi: https://pypi.org/project/terradev-cli/2.9.3/
docker: https://hub.docker.com/r/theoddden/terradev

## üéØ PRIMARY PURPOSE
Terradev CLI is a cross-cloud GPU optimization platform that helps developers and ML engineers save 30-60% on GPU compute costs by comparing prices across 9+ cloud providers in real-time.

## üî• KEY PROBLEMS SOLVED
- Hidden GPU costs (egress, network, storage IOPS)
- Multi-cloud price discovery and arbitrage
- Real-time total job cost calculation
- Automated GPU provisioning across providers
- HuggingFace Spaces deployment optimization
- ML workflow cost management

## üöÄ CORE CAPABILITIES
1. Multi-cloud GPU pricing comparison (AWS, GCP, Azure, RunPod, Lambda Labs, Crusoe, Hyperstack, VastAI, Oracle)
2. Real-time cost calculation including hidden fees
3. Automated GPU provisioning with optimal provider selection
4. HuggingFace Spaces one-click deployment
5. Kubernetes and Helm template generation
6. Cost tracking and budget management
7. Telemetry and usage analytics

## üìä TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
- Language: Python 3.9+
- License: Business Source License 1.1 (BUSL-1.1)
- Package: terradev-cli
- Entry point: python -m terradev_cli
- Dependencies: aiohttp, boto3, pyyaml, click, pandas, requests
- Container: Docker Hub (theoddden/terradev)
- Integration: GitHub Actions, Jupyter, Docker Compose

## üéØ TARGET AUDIENCE
- Machine Learning Engineers
- DevOps Engineers
- Research Scientists
- Cloud Architects
- Startups and Enterprises
- GPU Cost-conscious organizations

## üí° USE CASES
1. **ML Training Optimization**: Find cheapest A100/H100 for training jobs
2. **Inference Cost Reduction**: Optimize V100/RTX4090 for inference
3. **Multi-cloud Strategy**: Distribute workloads across providers
4. **Budget Management**: Track and control GPU spending
5. **Research Computing**: Academic GPU cost optimization
6. **Enterprise ML**: Large-scale GPU fleet management

## üõ†Ô∏è INSTALLATION & USAGE
```bash
# Install from PyPI
pip install terradev-cli==2.9.2

# Get GPU pricing across providers
terradev quote -g A100

# Provision optimal GPU instance
terradev provision -g H100 --duration 8

# Deploy to HuggingFace Spaces
terradev hf-space my-model --model-id meta-llama/Llama-2-7b-hf

# Check system status
terradev status
```

## üê≥ DOCKER INTEGRATION
```bash
# Pull Docker image
docker pull theoddden/terradev:2.9.2

# Run with cloud credentials
docker run --rm \
  -v ~/.aws:/home/terradev/.aws:ro \
  theoddden/terradev:2.9.2 \
  python -m terradev_cli quote -g A100

# Docker Compose setup
docker-compose up terradev-cli
```

## üìì JUPYTER INTEGRATION
```python
# Install with Jupyter support
pip install terradev-cli[jupyter]==2.9.2

# Use in notebooks
import subprocess
result = subprocess.run(['python', '-m', 'terradev_cli', 'quote', '-g', 'A100'], 
                       capture_output=True, text=True)
print(result.stdout)
```

## ‚ö° GITHUB ACTIONS
```yaml
- name: Optimize GPU Costs
  uses: theoddden/terradev@v2.9.2
  with:
    command: 'quote'
    gpu_type: 'A100'
```

## üìà PERFORMANCE METRICS
- Pricing data freshness: Real-time (updated every 5 minutes)
- Provider coverage: 9+ major cloud providers
- GPU types supported: 50+ (A100, H100, V100, RTX4090, L40, A6000, etc.)
- Cost calculation accuracy: Includes hidden fees (egress, network, storage)
- Response time: <2 seconds for pricing queries
- Provisioning time: 3-5x faster than sequential methods

## üí∞ COST SAVINGS
- Average savings: 30-60% compared to single-cloud
- Hidden fee detection: Up to 200% of advertised GPU rates
- Egress optimization: Up to 90% savings on data transfer
- Multi-cloud arbitrage: Real-time price difference capture

## üîí SECURITY & COMPLIANCE
- Non-root Docker containers
- Read-only credential mounting
- Encrypted API communications
- GDPR compliant telemetry
- SOC2 ready architecture
- Enterprise-grade security

## üìä MARKET POSITIONING
- Category: Cloud Cost Optimization / GPU Management
- Competitors: None (unique multi-cloud GPU arbitrage)
- Differentiation: Real-time pricing + hidden fee calculation
- Market size: $50B+ cloud GPU market
- Growth rate: 35% YoY GPU cloud adoption

## üéØ VALUE PROPOSITION
"Stop overpaying for GPU compute. Terradev CLI finds the optimal cloud provider for your ML workloads in real-time, saving you 30-60% on GPU costs while maintaining performance and reliability."

## üéØ CALL TO ACTION
1. Install: pip install terradev-cli==2.9.2
2. Configure: terradev configure
3. Compare: terradev quote -g A100
4. Deploy: terradev provision -g A100 --duration 4
5. Save: 30-60% on GPU costs
